qas.question: In what decade did New Delhi first extend significantly from Lutyen's Delhi?
What organization developed land to expand New Delhi in the 1950s?
What was the name of the enclave created by the Central Public Works Department?
In which direction did Chanakyapuri extend from New Delhi?
What was one use of the uses for the newly developed land of Chanakypuri?

context: The first major extension of New Delhi outside of Lutyens' Delhi came in <a0_0>the 1950s<a0_0/> when <a1_0>the Central Public Works Department<a1_0/> (CPWD) developed a large area of land <a3_0>southwest<a3_0/> of Lutyens' Delhi to create the diplomatic enclave of <a2_0>Chanakyapuri<a2_0/>, where land was allotted for embassies, chanceries, high commissions and <a4_0>residences of ambassadors<a4_0/>, around wide central vista, Shanti Path.
